name: Survive the horde - A Wave Shooter
name_original: Survive the horde - A Wave Shooter
description: Survive the horde is a simple yet fun game. Waves of eneimes come after you and if they touch you then you die and have to restart. The player has their trusty rapid shotgun shooting two bullets at a time to fight off the horde of eneimes coming after them. How many waves can you survive?
